He believed that, like Rome, New Orleans could
not be made nor saved in a day ; that wc should not
cut ourselves oil' from the sympathies of the South
and the West; that our movements must be on a
gigantic scale, to be commensurate with our duties
and our dangers. We must send out our emissaries,
